contact_sub: I would love to work with you
name: Jérémy Richard
bio: I build modern websites and apps with React, Vue, Laravel, and Tailwind. I turn concepts into reliable, elegant, and user-friendly digital solutions.

1.title: MySupplement
1.description: Smart assistant recommending dietary supplements. Developed with Nuxt.js & Laravel, using GPT-4, Stripe, Amazon API, and a full admin dashboard.

2.title: MyScent
2.description: AI-powered platform to create personalized perfumes. Built with Laravel & Vue.js, using OpenAI to generate custom scent compositions.

3.title: WakfuCrafter
3.description: Nuxt 3 site allowing you to view and filter items from Ankama's Wakfu game.

4.title: Kasa
4.description: React Sass website for vacation accommodation listings.

5.title: Les Petits Plats
5.description: Recipe search site built with vanilla JavaScript.

6.title: Fish Eye
6.description: Photography platform connecting clients and photographers.

8.title: Booki
8.description: Accommodation listing site made with HTML/CSS.

1.title: React
1.description: React is my go-to library for building user interfaces. It enables fast, component-based development.

2.title: Next
2.description: Next.js is my main React framework. It simplifies routing and server-side rendering for better performance.

3.title: Tailwind
3.description: Tailwind CSS helps me build modern, responsive UIs rapidly with utility-first classes.

4.title: Vue
4.description: Vue.js is a progressive framework I use for building performant and reactive interfaces.

5.title: Laravel
5.description: Laravel is my favorite PHP backend framework. I use it to build robust APIs and full-stack applications.

6.title: TypeScript
6.description: TypeScript adds static typing to JavaScript. It makes my code more robust and easier to maintain.
